events.name: reveal
events.description_zh: 当“显示”状态发生更改时发出

model-value.desc: Model of the component defining if it is shown or hidden to the user; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

reveal.description: Enable 'reveal' mode; Takes into account user scroll to temporarily show/hide header
reveal.description_zh: 启用“显示”模式;考虑用户滚动以临时显示/隐藏标题

reveal-offset.description: Amount of scroll (in pixels) that should trigger a 'reveal' state change
reveal-offset.description_zh: 应触发“显示”状态更改的滚动量（以像素为单位）

elevated.description: Adds a default shadow to the header

height-hint.description: When using SSR, you can optionally hint of the height (in pixels) of the QHeader
height-hint.description_zh: 使用 SSR 时，您可以选择提示 QHeader 的高度（以像素为单位）
